wedding.title: The Big Day
wedding.subtitle: Celebrate with us in the city of Venice
wedding.description: We're getting married in Venice and we want to share this special day with you.
wedding.step1Note: Buses will be available for guests who need them.
wedding.step2Warning: ⚠️ Boats depart towards the church. It is ESSENTIAL to be on time — there are no other options to reach the ceremony.
wedding.step3Location: Church of the Jesuits · Salizada dei Spechieri, 4877, Venice
wedding.step4Warning: ⚠️ Maximum punctuality required for the return boat.
wedding.step5Location: Ristorante Da Guido · Via Roma Sinistra, 25, Jesolo
wedding.dresscodeDescription: We request formal attire suitable for a daytime celebration. Please note that white is reserved for the bride.

prewedding.title: Pre-Wedding
prewedding.subtitle: Join us the evening before our wedding
prewedding.description: The night before the wedding, we'd love to have an informal get-together with all of you. It'll be the perfect way to kick off the weekend!
